Favourite Move/Movelist
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls): Monster Rancher 2 Polls: Favourite Move/Movelist
By Elf* on Sunday, June 27, 2010 - 11:33 am:

Never really thought about it before, but having started on a wracky I've found all of their Int.
moves awesome, particularly necromancy, so they by far take my favourite movelist. Baku's diving
press still cracks me up every time I see it however, so that has to take the favourite move
spot. Any other thoughts?

By big jay on Tuesday, June 29, 2010 - 10:27 am:

Lets see... best moves, my favorite move-list would have to be Worm. Especially all the tail lashes and somersaults. As far as individual moves go, Arrowheads acrobatics move is the my favorite, at least that's what i think its called... oh and golem's charge move... i cant remember its name but there's something about watching that huge behemoth launch a suezo 30 feet into the air, with his shoulder, that makes me smile. :)

By Azulazulazula on Saturday, January 14, 2012 - 02:41 am:

Oh, boy...well, I adore pixies' move lists (though I can barely stomach raising one), as well as Gaboos and Galis. Due to Jokers' simplicity in their move lists, I've always loved theirs, too. XD

Anyways, my absolute favorite move...oi. Um...gotta be the Zilla's Wave Riding. Nothing else like it. At all. And I mean, AT ALL. Just the perfect move. Hopper Combo and Zilla Rush (yes, I'm a Zilla fan) come real close, though.

By lileave on Friday, March 30, 2012 - 12:55 am:

I'd have to say my favorite movesets are
Arrowhead's, Ape's, Ducken's, Niton's, and Jell's.
They're all pretty unique and fun. However, I dislike
Kato because his moveset is partially unobtainable,
and I am pretty disappointed in Plant's intelligence
options. There are essentially three (Seed Gatling,
Toxic Pollen, and Life Steal) and in order to get Life
Steal it has to be evil, and that's a hassle. Suezo's
could also use a little buffing out, but it's not bad.
Some like Joker's simplicity, but I prefer options, so
I'd have to say I dislike it.
